org.aksw.simba.hibiscus

Class HibiscusConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.aksw.simba.hibiscus.HibiscusConfig

  • public class HibiscusConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    HiBISCuS configurations setup. Need to run one time in the start before query execution
    Author:
    Saleem

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(java.lang.String InputFedSummaries,
                              java.lang.String inputMode,
                              double inputCommonPredThreshold)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        HiBISCuS Configurations. Must call this method once before starting source selection. mode can be either set to Index_dominant or ASK_dominant. See details in FedSum paper.
        Parameters:
        inputCommonPredThreshold - Threshold value between common and normal predicates
        inputMode - Source Selection mode i.e. Index_dominant or ASK_dominant
        InputFedSummaries - Summaries of all the available data sources
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Errors

      • loadDataSources

        public static void loadDataSources()
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Initialize list of SPARQL endpoints from FedSummaires
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Errors

      • loadCommonPredList

        public static void loadCommonPredList()
                               throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException,
                                      org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException,
                                      org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException
        Load common predicate list using the threshold value specified as input
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - Repository Error
        org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException - Query Error
        org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException - Query Execution Error

      • loadFedSummaries

        public static void loadFedSummaries(java.lang.String FedSummaries)
        Load HiBISCuS Summaries file into sesame in memory model
        Parameters:
        FedSummaries - Summaries file
